text: A merchant bank shall not be liquidated except as provided by this chapter or in accordance with the order of a court of competent jurisdiction.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Commissioner Possession, Receivership, Conservatorship, and Liquidation of Merchant Banks.

heading.catch_text: Liquidation of merchant banks in general.
